kpi.name: m3072c0011

kpi_info.title: NUMBER OF UPLINK NON-TCP/UDP PACKETS DROPPED PER SESSION PROFILE DUE TO DOWNLINK FLOW INITIATION
kpi_info.use: This counter contains the number of uplink non_TCP_UDP packets dropped per session profile due to downlink flow initiation. The flow initiation direction is set through the flow-initiation parameter in the PCC rule filter configuration. UPDATED: Updated when an uplinknon_TCP_UDP packet is dropped due to downlink flow initiation.

kpi.kpi_alias: NUMBER OF UPLINK NON-TCP/UDP PACKETS DROPPED PER SESSION PROFILE DUE TO DOWNLINK FLOW INITIATION
